mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.SALE_PRICE AS "salePrice", a.DOWNLOAD_URL AS "downloadUrl", a.MATERIAL_TITLE AS "materialTitle", a.IMG_URL AS "imgUrl", a.SIZE, a.BASE_PRICE AS "basePrice"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tb_material a
left join rela_user_material b on a.id= b.material_id
a.del_flag = #{delFlag}
AND a.SALE_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{salePrice}, '%')
AND a.DOWNLOAD_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{downloadUrl}, '%')
AND a.MATERIAL_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{materialTitle}, '%')
AND a.IMG_URL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{imgUrl}, '%')
AND a.SIZE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{size}, '%')
AND a.BASE_PRICE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{basePrice}, '%')
and b. user_Id = #{b.userId}
${sqlMap.dsf}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_material( id, create_date, update_date, remarks, del_flag, SALE_PRICE, DOWNLOAD_URL, MATERIAL_TITLE, IMG_URL, SIZE, BASE_PRICE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{salePrice}, #{downloadUrl}, #{materialTitle}, #{imgUrl}, #{size}, #{basePrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_material SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}
